mapper.select: select rownum, a.* from( select * from PRODUCT_INFO pi2 order by INSERT_DAY DESC) a WHERE rownum >= (10*#{value})+1 and rownum <= (10*(#{value}+1))
select rownum, a.* from( select * from DRINK_INFO pi2 order by INSERT_DAY DESC) a WHERE rownum >= (10*#{value})+1 and rownum <= (10*(#{value}+1))
select rownum, a.* from( select * from event pi2 order by INSERT_DAY DESC) a WHERE rownum >= (10*#{value})+1 and rownum <= (10*(#{value}+1))
